Variable.Name: dt
Variable.Comment: The increment for the time in each evolution step

Variable.Name: G
Variable.Comment: The acceleration caused by gravity of a free fall

Variable.Name: mass
Variable.Comment: The x position of the body center

Variable.Name: x
Variable.Comment: The Y position of the body center

Variable.Name: Guniversal
Variable.Comment: G*m*M factor from Newton's law of gravitation (1.53e-6 in odd units)

PreliminaryCode.Comment: Code to be executed before rate equations are evaluated
